title: Isabel Lucas slams Liam Hemsworth romance rumours after previously dating his older brother Chris
text:
She was romantically linked to Chris Hemsworth for three years back in 2005.

And on Sunday, Isabel Lucas, 34, laughed off reports she's found love with his younger brother Liam Hemsworth in the wake of his split from Miley Cyrus.

'Obviously we are just good friends', she told The Daily Telegraph..

'We're just good friends': Isabel Lucas (pictured) slammed reports she's dating Liam Hemsworth on Sunday- after previously dating his older brother Chris in 2015

'The Hemsworths are a beautiful family. It's a strong community in Byron, and I am so grateful to have so many beautiful friends there,' she added.

In August, Woman's Day reported Liam, 29, had been 'seeking comfort' in friend Isabel Lucas after his shock split from Miley Cyrus.

'Liam's in Byron staying with Chris. Isabel moves in the same social circles up there, and they've spent some time together,' an insider allegedly told the publication.

Family friends: 'The Hemsworths are a beautiful family. It's a strong community in Byron, and I am so grateful to have so many beautiful friends there,' she told the Daily Telegraph on Sunday

The report went on to say: 'They've become quite good friends. She's there to take his mind off things, and she's been an excellent person to turn to for advice.

'She's in Europe at the moment and feels bad she's jetted out during the worst of it for Liam, but even so, she's been keeping in touch via text.'

Isabel actually dated Liam's brother Chris between 2005 to 2008, with the pair meeting on the set of long-running drama Home and Away.

End of an era: Liam and Miley stunned fans when they revealed they had split after just seven months of marriage, after they had previously dated for 10 years

Earlier this month, Liam was pictured in a heated PDA session with 22-year-old Dynasty star Maddison Brown.

The pair are yet to publicly comment on their steamy romance.

Meanwhile, Miley has been enjoying a whirlwind romance with Australian singer Cody Simpson.
description: She was romantically linked to Chris Hemsworth for three years back in 2005.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
